channel.title: Need help finding Crystal chest for testscape
channel.description: hi, Can anyone find OR better yet make a tut so that you can get random items from the Crystal chest? I tried one but it said the topic was off limits to me so... PLEASE HELP :)

item.title: Need help finding Crystal chest for testscape

item.title: Need help finding Crystal chest for testscape
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

For most sources the crystal chest is in taverly in the top building. This means when you walk in from falador, you will walk right past it.

–Tico135–

Read full topic
item.source: Need help finding Crystal chest for testscape

item.title: Need help finding Crystal chest for testscape
item.dc:creator: @flipmc flipmc
item.description:
@flipmc wrote:

Search this in your “client.java”;
Crystal Chest

It might be located in the command section, but for most servers it doesn’t.
The only server I know that has it, is RussianScape.
[hr]
[size=8pt]Owner Of:[/size] [size=8pt]AbandonedScape[/size]
[size=8pt]Credits:[/size] [size=8pt]Flip & LeScape PK[/size]
